I have a single, L-shaped, yellow-orange hairless patch on the left side near the front of my ear, and it seems to be changing in texture.

No, I don't have similar patches elsewhere on my body.

No, there is no relevant family history of similar skin conditions.

No, I haven't experienced any itching or burning in that area.
Final Diagnosis: Nevus sebaceous
